trans-unit.source: Defines a segment of time that may contain child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 定義可能包含子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 物件的時間區段。

trans-unit.source: These child timelines become active according to their respective <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些子時刻表會根據其各自的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 屬性變為使用中狀態。

trans-unit.source: Also, child timelines are able to overlap (run in parallel) with each other.
trans-unit.target: 此外，子時刻表能夠彼此重疊 (平行執行)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> objects can be children (nested inside) of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> 物件可以是子系 （巢狀方式置於） <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>。

trans-unit.source: This can provide better encapsulation of timing sequences in complex animations.
trans-unit.target: 這可以提供更好的封裝，將複雜的動畫時間序列。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> has its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> property therefore all child timeline <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> values are relative to the parent <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> value for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> 有它自己<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>屬性因此所有子時刻表<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>值是相對於父系<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline>值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />，初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />，初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> to return the natural duration from.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中傳回自然持續期間的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" />。

trans-unit.source: Return the natural duration (duration of a single iteration) from a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" />.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> 傳回自然持續期間 (單一反覆運算的持續期間)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> quantity representing the natural duration.
trans-unit.target: 表示自然持續期間的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> 數量。

trans-unit.source: A natural duration is the period of a single iteration.
trans-unit.target: 自然持續期間是單一的反覆項目。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> it means that the natural duration is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>則代表自然持續期間是未知。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> is determined by the author.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>作者所決定。

trans-unit.source: For example, the duration of streaming media would be determined by the provider of the streaming media.
trans-unit.target: 例如，進行媒體串流處理的持續時間會決定串流處理媒體的提供者。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> children slips.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定當這個時刻表的一個或多個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 子項目滑動時，它的行為模式為何。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> children slips.
trans-unit.target: 一個值，表示當這個時刻表的一個或多個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 子項目滑動時，它的行為模式為何。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow" />。

trans-unit.source: It is often desirable to synchronize animations and media.
trans-unit.target: 它通常會同步處理動畫和媒體。

trans-unit.source: However, this is complicated by the fact that media playback can be delayed by loading or buffering making it difficult to reliably play an animation along with media.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這 cross-frame 播放該媒體可能會因為延遲載入或緩衝處理，因此很難可靠地播放動畫和媒體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> property is used to determine what happens when media and animations are played together.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>屬性用來判斷一起播放媒體和動畫時會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow> (default) specifies that animation timelines do not need to be synced and will play when specified regardless of the state of other media in the timeline.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow>（預設值） 指定動畫時間軸不需要進行同步處理，而且會在指定時間軸中的其他媒體狀態而時播放。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip> on the other hand, specifies that an animation will wait (slip) until media is ready to play.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip>相反地，指定動畫會等候 (slip)，直到已準備好要播放的媒體。

trans-unit.source: The diagrams below illustrate this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 下圖說明這項行為。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> plays a video and an animation.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>播放視訊及動畫。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow> and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> grows to play all media and animations.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>設為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>設為<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>增大，以播放所有媒體與動畫。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram")
trans-unit.target: ![圖表： SlipBehavior 圖表金鑰](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "圖表： SlipBehavior 圖表的索引鍵")

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow")
trans-unit.target: ![圖表： SlipBehavior 屬性值為 Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "圖表： SlipBehavior 屬性值為 Grow")

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds which gives media and animations 5 seconds to play regardless of how much they slip.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>提供媒體和動畫 5 秒播放不論它們略過多少 5 秒。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow")
trans-unit.target: ![圖表： SlipBehavior 屬性值為 Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "圖表： SlipBehavior 屬性值為 Grow")

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip>.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip>。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> (and any other non-media children of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) does not progress unless the media timeline is also progressing.
trans-unit.target: 請注意， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> (和任何其他非媒體子系<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) 不會不會進行，除非也逐漸媒體時間軸。

trans-unit.source: If the media takes a while to load, or if it is buffering, the animation will wait (slips) with it.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒體花的時間才能載入，或正在緩衝，動畫會在等候 （滑動） 與它。

trans-unit.source: This allows animations to synchronize with a single media file.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓與單一媒體檔案同步處理的動畫。

trans-unit.source: ![SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation")
trans-unit.target: ![媒體和動畫的 SlipBehavior 圖表](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "媒體和動畫的 SlipBehavior 圖表")

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>5 秒。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the media file and animation are guaranteed to play for 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，媒體檔案和動畫保證都能播放的 5 秒。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard")
trans-unit.target: ![圖表： 分鏡腳本的 SlipBehavior 屬性](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "圖表： 分鏡腳本的 SlipBehavior 屬性")

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)
trans-unit.target: [相依性屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)
